languages.text: {n}Бродяга молниеносно выхватывает из-под лохмотьев пистолет и берет вас на прицел.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} нов{mf|ый|ая} босоног{mf|ий друг|ая подруга}, {mf|шел|шла} бы ты отсюда ."
{n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."
languages.original_text: {n}Бродяга молниеносно выхватывает из-под лохмотьев пистолет и берет вас на прицел.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} нов{mf|ый|ая} босоног{mf|ий друг|ая подруга}, {mf|шел|шла} бы ты отсюда ."

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞食は稲妻のような速さでボロ布の下からピストルを取り出し、こちらに向ける。{/n}「裸足の新しい友人、俺にかまうのはよすんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食は稲妻のような速さでボロ布の下からピストルを取り出し、こちらに向ける。{/n}「裸足の新しい友人、俺にかまうのはよすんだな」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞丐以闪电般的速度，从褴褛的衣裳下面抽出了手枪，瞄准了你。{/n}“我建议咱们还是各走各的路吧，光脚的新朋友。”
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐以闪电般的速度，从褴褛的衣裳下面抽出了手枪，瞄准了你。{/n}“我建议咱们还是各走各的路吧，光脚的新朋友。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mendigo es rápido como un rayo. Saca una pistola de debajo de sus harapos y te apunta con ella.{/n} «Le sugiero que siga su alegre camino, nuev{mf|o|a} amig{mf|o|a} descalz{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}El mendigo es rápido como un rayo. Saca una pistola de debajo de sus harapos y te apunta con ella.{/n} «Le sugiero que siga su alegre camino, nuev{mf|o|a} amig{mf|o|a} descalz{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Bettler ist blitzschnell: Er zieht eine Pistole aus seinen Lumpen und zielt damit auf dich.{/n} "Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Eures fröhlichen Weges geht, {mf|mein neuer stiefelloser Freund|meine neue stiefellose Freundin}."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bettler ist blitzschnell: Er zieht eine Pistole aus seinen Lumpen und zielt damit auf dich.{/n} "Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Eures fröhlichen Weges geht, {mf|mein neuer stiefelloser Freund|meine neue stiefellose Freundin}."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, le mendiant tire un pistolet de sous ses guenilles et le pointe sur vous.{/n} « Je vous suggère fortement de poursuivre votre chemin, mon {mf|ami|amie} aux pieds nus. »
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rapide comme l'éclair, le mendiant tire un pistolet de sous ses guenilles et le pointe sur vous.{/n} « Je vous suggère fortement de poursuivre votre chemin, mon {mf|ami|amie} aux pieds nus. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Dilenci, üzerine sarındığı bezlerin altından şimşek hızıyla bir tabanca çıkarıp sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Bence sen de hayırlısıyla kendi yoluna yürü git yalın ayak kardeşim."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar is lightning-quick: he pulls out a pistol from under his rags and aims it at you.{/n} "I suggest you go on your merry way, my new barefoot friend."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenci şimşek gibi hızlı bir şekilde üzerine sarındığı bezlerin altından bir tabanca çıkarıp sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Bence sen de hayırlısıyla kendi yoluna ilerle yalın ayak kardeşim."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
